thread.title: BitTitan Confirmed as Gold Sponsor of SharePoint Fest - Chicago 2015
thread.title_full: BitTitan Confirmed as Gold Sponsor of SharePoint Fest - Chicago 2015 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: BitTitan Confirmed as Gold Sponsor of SharePoint Fest - Chicago 2015
text:
BitTitan has been named a Gold Sponsor of SharePoint Fest - Chicago, to be held at McCormick Place in Chicago, Illinois, December 8-10, 2015.
Chicago, Illinois
BitTitan is a Gold Sponsor of SharePoint Fest Chicago, and joins other sponsors in bringing this conference to McCormick Place in Chicago, Illinois, December 8-10, 2015.
Conference delegates will hear from keynote speakers and attend breakout sessions. Over 70 sessions will be offered across multiple tracks, as well as an optional day of workshops preceding the conference. There will also be a networking reception held at the end of the first day of the conference.
About BitTitan
BitTitan is the IT change automation expert, delivering end-to-end solutions for migration and onboarding challenges. BitTitan's flagship product, MigrationWiz, is the leading cloud-based data migration service, enabling companies around the globe to easily migrate data to other systems and platforms. BitTitan removes the barriers to change, enabling companies to be current with their technology, while eliminating the chaos, risk and costs associated with change. BitTitan's globally recognized products, MigrationWiz, DeploymentPro, UserActivation and Data Encryption, deliver tailored solutions for today's challenges, including Office 365 onboarding, data and email migration and Office 365 data encryption.
Website: https://www.bittitan.com
About SharePoint Fest
SharePoint Fest is in its fifth year. It offers a two-day conference (with an optional workshop day) that brings together SharePoint enthusiasts and practitioners, with many of the leading SharePoint experts and solution providers in the country.
Attend SharePoint Fest – Chicago, where attendees will be able to attend workshops and seminars – taught by Microsoft Certified Trainers, Microsoft engineers, and Microsoft MCM's and MVPs – covering Enterprise Content Management, Implementation/Administration, Business Value, Search, Business Intelligence, Office 365 and SharePoint Development. Attendees will be able to choose one complete learning track or mix and match based on what content best meets their current needs.
At SharePoint Fest - Chicago, there will be sessions created for SharePoint administrators, software developers, business analysts, information architects, and knowledge workers, which will ensure that attendees walk away with as much knowledge as they desire to truly leverage SharePoint in their current environment.
Website: http://www.sharepointfest.com/Chicago
